content.description: The following procedure is intended to return the number of times the value val appears in the list myList. The procedure does not work as intended.
content.question: Line 01: PROCEDURE countNumOccurences(myList, val) Line 02: { Line 03: FOR EACH item IN myList Line 04: { Line 05: count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0 Line 06: IF(item = val) Line 07: { Line 08: count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1 Line 09: } Line 10: } Line 11: RETURN(count) Line 12: } Which of the following changes can be made so that the procedure will work as intended?

choices.label: Moving the statement in line 5 so that it appears between lines 2 and 3
Moving the statement in line 11 so that it appears between lines 9 and 10

content.answer: Moving the statement in line 5 so that it appears between lines 2 and 3

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
